mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of John Helms
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of John Helms Joseph Helms, Administrator Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 176, in Floyd County Courthouse Note: There are similar records included here except that the name is spelled Helm.
